home.title: What would you like to do?
home.reportDescription: Create a new report about an open manhole, a pothole, a road crack, a broken streetlight, or a streetlight that is on during the day, to help ensure a faster response and protect citizens’ safety.
home.checkTitle: Check for Issues in a Place I will Visit
home.checkDescription: Proactively check the status and types of reported issues in a neighborhood you plan to visit. You can search by place name or open the auto-navigator; it will notify you about issues along your route.
home.helpCommunityDescription: Join local volunteers and help follow up on whether submitted reports have been resolved, to increase their credibility, build trust, and be part of helping your community.
